ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord knows best what you are doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Shu'aib) said: "My Lord knows well what you are doing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Shuayb said: "My Lord knows well all what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "My Lord knows all that you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “My Lord is Well Aware of what you do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord is the Best Knower of what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord knows best what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'My Lord knows very well what you are doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord is Best Aware of what ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "My Lord has full knowledge of all your actions."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He. said: My Lord is the Best Knower of that which ye work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord knows best what you are doing.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "My Lord knows best what ye do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord is the Best Knower of what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'My Lord knows what you are doing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord is Well Aware of what you do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:188] He said, ‘My Lord knows best what you are doing’, and will requite you for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Shu'ayb said: (My Lord is best aware of what ye do) in your state of disbelief, and He is more aware of you and your punishment.
